name: deal with
example_en: She has to deal with a lot of paperwork every day.
example_cn: 她每天都要处理大量的文书工作。
word_family: dealer (n. 经销商), dealing (n. 交易, 行为)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'dǣlan'，意为分配或分享。记忆技巧：可以将 'deal' 想象成一副牌，每次处理或应付问题就像是在玩牌，需要策略和技巧。图像记忆：想象一个忙碌的办公室，桌子上堆满了文件，一个人正在有条不紊地处理这些文件。

image_prompt.main_image: A busy office scene with a person organizing a pile of documents on a desk, looking focused and efficient.
image_prompt.example_image: A woman sitting at her desk, surrounded by stacks of papers, using a computer to manage her tasks.

collocations: deal with stress (应对压力); deal with issues (处理问题); big deal (大事)
